mathematica: t[n_, 0] := BellB[n]; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = t[n, k - 1] + t[n - 1, n - k]; a[n_] := t[n, n]; Array[a, 30, 0] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 12 2016 *)
